00040 static const int Array_CAPMIN = 1;

00056 template<class T> class Array

00062 protected:

00066     int _capacity;
00069     int _capacityIncrement;
00071     T _defaultValue;
00073     T *_array;

00082 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00089 virtual ~Array()
00090 {
00091     if(_array!=NULL) { delete[] _array;  _array = NULL; }
00092 }
00093 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00105 Array(const T &aDefaultValue=T(),int aSize=0,int aCapacity=Array_CAPMIN)
00106 {
00107     setNull();
00108 
00109     // DEFAULT VALUE
00110     _defaultValue = aDefaultValue;
00111 
00112     // CAPACITY
00113     int newCapacity;
00114     int min = aSize + 1;
00115     if(min < aCapacity) min = aCapacity;
00116     computeNewCapacity(min,newCapacity);
00117     ensureCapacity(newCapacity);
00118 
00119     // SIZE
00120     _size = aSize;
00121     if(_size<0) _size=0;
00122 }
00123 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00129 Array(const Array<T> &aArray)
00130 {
00131     setNull();
00132     *this = aArray;
00133 }
00134 
00135 private:
00136 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00140 void setNull()
00141 {
00142     _size = 0;
00143     _capacityIncrement = -1;
00144     _capacity = 0;
00145     _array = NULL;
00146 }

00153 // A non-operator version of operator== which we can use in java
00154 // NOTE: I tried to name it "equals" since that's the standard way to compare objects in
00155 // java, but didn't seem to work...  - Eran
00156 bool arrayEquals(const Array<T> &aArray) const
00157 {
00158     return *this == aArray;
00159 }

00198 Array<T>& operator=(const Array<T> &aArray)
00199 {
00200     _size = aArray._size;
00201     _capacity = aArray._capacity;
00202     _capacityIncrement = aArray._capacityIncrement;
00203     _defaultValue = aArray._defaultValue;
00204 
00205     // ARRAY
00206     if(_array!=NULL) delete[] _array;
00207     _array = new T[_capacity];
00208     for(int i=0;i<_capacity;i++) _array[i] = aArray._array[i];
00209 
00210     return(*this);
00211 }
00212 
00213 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00214 // EQUALITY (==)
00215 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00216 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00227 bool operator==(const Array<T> &aArray) const
00228 {
00229     if(_size != aArray._size) return(false);
00230 
00231     int i;
00232     for(i=0;i<_size;i++) {
00233         if( !(_array[i]==aArray._array[i]) ) return(false);
00234     }
00235 
00236     return(true);
00237 }

00253 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &aOut,const Array<T> &aArray)
00254 {
00255     aOut << "Array["<<aArray.getSize()<<"]=";
00256 
00257     int i;
00258     for(i=0;i<aArray.getSize();i++)  {
00259         aOut << " ";
00260         aOut << aArray[i];
00261     }
00262

00267 //=============================================================================
00268 // CAPACITY
00269 //=============================================================================
00270 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00292 bool computeNewCapacity(int aMinCapacity,int &rNewCapacity)
00293 {
00294     rNewCapacity = _capacity;
00295     if(rNewCapacity < Array_CAPMIN) rNewCapacity = Array_CAPMIN;
00296 
00297     // CHECK FOR ZERO INCREMENT
00298     if(_capacityIncrement == 0) {
00299         printf("Array.computeNewCapacity: WARN- capacity is set");
00300         printf(" not to increase (i.e., _capacityIncrement==0).\n");
00301         return(false);
00302     }
00303 
00304     // INCREMENT UNTIL LARGER THAN THE MINIMUM SIZE
00305     while(rNewCapacity < aMinCapacity) {
00306         if(_capacityIncrement < 0) {
00307             rNewCapacity = 2 * rNewCapacity;
00308         } else {
00309             rNewCapacity = rNewCapacity + _capacityIncrement;
00310         }
00311     }
00312 
00313     return(true);
00314 }
00315 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00323 bool ensureCapacity(int aCapacity)
00324 {
00325     // CHECK REQUESTED CAPACITY
00326     if(aCapacity < Array_CAPMIN) aCapacity = Array_CAPMIN;
00327     if(_capacity>=aCapacity) return(true);
00328 
00329     // ALLOCATE THE NEW ARRAY
00330     int i;
00331     T *newArray = new T[aCapacity];
00332     if(newArray==NULL) {
00333         printf("Array.ensureCapacity: ERR- failed to increase capacity.\n");
00334         return(false);
00335     }
00336 
00337     // COPY CURRENT ARRAY
00338     if(_array!=NULL) {
00339         for(i=0;i<_size;i++) newArray[i] = _array[i];
00340         for(i=_size;i<aCapacity;i++) newArray[i] = _defaultValue;
00341         delete []_array;  _array=NULL;
00342     } else {
00343         for(i=0;i<aCapacity;i++) newArray[i] = _defaultValue;
00344     }
00345     
00346     // REASSIGN
00347     _capacity = aCapacity;
00348     _array = newArray;
00349 
00350     return(true);
00351 }
00352 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00360 void trim()
00361 {
00362     // COMPUTE NEW CAPACITY
00363     int newCapacity = _size + 1;
00364     if(newCapacity>=_capacity) return;
00365     if(newCapacity<Array_CAPMIN) newCapacity = Array_CAPMIN;
00366 
00367     // ALLOCATE TEMPORARY ARRAY
00368     int i;
00369     T *array = new T[newCapacity];
00370     if(array==NULL) {
00371         printf("Array.trim: ERR- unable to allocate temporary array.\n");
00372         return;
00373     }
00374 
00375     // COPY CURRENT ARRAY
00376     for(i=0;i<_size;i++) array[i] = _array[i];
00377 
00378     // DELETE OLD ARRAY
00379     delete[] _array;
00380 
00381     // REASSIGN ARRAY POINTER
00382     _array = array;
00383 
00384     // SET CORRECT CAPACITY
00385     _capacity = newCapacity;
00386 }
00387 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00391 int getCapacity() const
00392 {
00393 
00394     return(_capacity);
00395 }

00422 //=============================================================================
00423 // STORAGE OPERATIONS
00424 //=============================================================================
00425 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00426 // SIZE
00427 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00428 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00443 bool setSize(int aSize)
00444 {
00445     if(aSize==_size) return(true);
00446     if(aSize<0) aSize = 0;
00447     bool success = true;
00448     if(aSize<_size) {
00449         int i;
00450         for(i=(_size-1);i>=aSize;i--) _array[i] = _defaultValue;
00451         _size = aSize;
00452     } else if(aSize<=_capacity) {
00453         _size = aSize;
00454     } else {
00455         int newCapacity;
00456         success = computeNewCapacity(aSize+1,newCapacity);
00457         if(!success) return(false);
00458         success = ensureCapacity(newCapacity);
00459         if(success) _size = aSize;
00460     }
00461 
00462     return(success);
00463 }
00464 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00470 int getSize() const
00471 {
00472     return(_size);
00473 }
00474 
00475 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00476 // APPEND
00477 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00478 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00486 int append(const T &aValue)
00487 {
00488     // ENSURE CAPACITY
00489     if((_size+1)>=_capacity) {
00490         int newCapacity;
00491         bool success;
00492         success = computeNewCapacity(_size+1,newCapacity);
00493         if(!success) return(_size);
00494         success = ensureCapacity(newCapacity);
00495         if(!success) return(_size);
00496     }
00497 
00498     // SET
00499     _array[_size] = aValue;
00500     _size++;
00501 
00502     return(_size);
00503 }
00504 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00512 int append(const Array<T> &aArray)
00513 {
00514     // LOOP THROUGH THE ELEMENTS
00515     int i,n=aArray.getSize();
00516     for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
00517         append(aArray[i]);
00518     }
00519 
00520     return(_size);
00521 }
00522 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00531 int append(int aSize,const T *aArray)
00532 {
00533     if(aSize<0) return(_size);
00534     if(aArray==NULL) return(_size);
00535 
00536     // LOOP THROUGH THE ELEMENTS
00537     int i;
00538     for(i=0;i<aSize;i++) {
00539         append(aArray[i]);
00540     }
00541 
00542     return(_size);
00543 }
00544 
00545 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00546 // INSERT
00547 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00548 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00564 int insert(int aIndex,const T &aValue)
00565 {
00566     // NEGATIVE INDEX
00567     if(aIndex<0) {
00568         printf("Array.insert: ERR- aIndex was less than 0.\n");
00569         return(_size);
00570     }
00571 
00572     // INDEX PAST END OF ARRAY
00573     if(aIndex>=_size) {
00574         setSize(aIndex+1);
00575         _array[aIndex] = aValue;
00576         return(_size);
00577     }
00578 
00579     // ENSURE CAPACITY
00580     if((_size+1)>=_capacity) {
00581         int newCapacity;
00582         bool success;
00583         success = computeNewCapacity(_size+1,newCapacity);
00584         if(!success) return(_size);
00585         success = ensureCapacity(newCapacity);
00586         if(!success) return(_size);
00587     }
00588 
00589     // SHIFT ARRAY
00590     int i;
00591     for(i=_size;i>aIndex;i--) {
00592         _array[i] = _array[i-1];
00593     }
00594 
00595     // SET
00596     _array[aIndex] = aValue;
00597     _size++;
00598 
00599     return(_size);
00600 }
00601 
00602 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00603 // REMOVE
00604 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00605 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00618 int remove(int aIndex)
00619 {
00620     if(aIndex<0) {
00621         printf("Array.remove: ERR- aIndex was less than 0.\n");
00622         return(_size);
00623     }
00624     if(aIndex>=_size) {
00625         printf("Array.remove: ERR- aIndex was greater than or equal the ");
00626         printf("size of the array.\n");
00627         return(_size);
00628     }
00629 
00630     // SHIFT ARRAY
00631     int i;
00632     _size--;
00633     for(i=aIndex;i<_size;i++) {
00634         _array[i] = _array[i+1];
00635     }
00636     _array[_size] = _defaultValue;
00637 
00638     return(_size);
00639 }
00640 
00641 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00642 // SET AND GET
00643 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00644 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00654 void set(int aIndex,const T &aValue)
00655 {
00656     if(aIndex<0) return;
00657 
00658     // ENSURE CAPACITY
00659     bool success = false;
00660     if((aIndex+2)>=_capacity) {
00661         int newCapacity;
00662         success = computeNewCapacity(aIndex+2,newCapacity);
00663         if(!success) return;
00664         success = ensureCapacity(newCapacity);
00665         if(!success) return;
00666     }
00667 
00668     // SET
00669     _array[aIndex] = aValue;
00670 
00671     // FIRST EMPTY
00672     if(aIndex>=_size)  _size = aIndex+1;
00673 }
00674 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00680 T* get()
00681 {
00682     return(_array);
00683 }
00684 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00690 #ifndef SWIG
00691 const T* get() const
00692 {
00693     return(_array);
00694 }
00695 #endif
00696 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00711 T& get(int aIndex) const
00712 {
00713     if((aIndex<0)||(aIndex>=_size)) {
00714         throw(Exception("Array index out of bounds."));
00715     }
00716     return(_array[aIndex]);
00717 }
00718 #ifdef SWIG
00719   %extend {
00720     T getitem(int index) {
00721       return self->get(index);
00722     }
00723     void setitem(int index, T val) {
00724       self->set(index,val);
00725     }
00726   }
00727 #endif
00728 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00735 T& getLast() const
00736 {
00737     if(_size<=0) {
00738         throw(Exception("Array is empty."));
00739     }
00740     return(_array[_size-1]);
00741 }

00744 //=============================================================================
00745 // SEARCH
00746 //=============================================================================
00747 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00756 int findIndex(const T &aValue) const
00757 {
00758     for(int i=0;i<_size;i++) if(_array[i]==aValue) return i;
00759     return -1;
00760 }
00761 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00770 int rfindIndex(const T &aValue) const
00771 {
00772     for(int i=_size-1;i>=0;i--) if(_array[i]==aValue) return i;
00773     return -1;
00774 }
00775 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00806 int searchBinary(const T &aValue,bool aFindFirst=false,
00807                       int aLo=-1,int aHi=-1) const
00808 {
00809     if(_size<=0) return(-1);
00810     int lo = aLo;  if(lo<0) lo = 0;
00811     int hi = aHi;  if((hi<0)||(hi>=_size)) hi = _size - 1;
00812     int mid;
00813 
00814     // CHECK lo AND hi
00815     if(lo>hi) return(-1);
00816 
00817     // SEARCH
00818     while(lo <= hi) {
00819         mid = (lo + hi) / 2;
00820         if(aValue < _array[mid]) {
00821             hi = mid - 1;
00822         } else if(_array[mid] < aValue) {
00823             lo = mid + 1;
00824         } else {
00825             break;
00826         }
00827     }
00828 
00829     // MAKE SURE LESS THAN
00830     if(aValue < _array[mid]) mid--;
00831     if(mid<=0) {
00832         return(mid);
00833     }
00834 
00835     // FIND FIRST
00836     if(aFindFirst) {
00837         if(_array[mid-1]<_array[mid]) {
00838             return(mid);
00839         }
00840         lo = aLo;  if(lo<0) lo = 0;
00841         hi = mid;
00842         int mid2 = mid;
00843         T value2 = _array[mid];
00844         while(lo <= hi) {
00845             mid2 = (lo + hi) / 2;
00846             if(_array[mid2] == value2) {
00847                 hi = mid2 - 1;
00848             } else if(_array[mid2] < value2) {
00849                 lo = mid2 + 1;
00850             }
00851         }
00852         if(_array[mid2]<value2) mid2++;
00853         if(mid2<mid) mid = mid2;
00854     }
00855 
00856     return(mid);
00857 }
